user.speaker: user
user.text: what about why can't I apply a feature code?

agent.speaker: agent
agent.text: You might not be able to apply a feature code because your account doesn't meet the requirements for the feature code, you don't have the required access in the account, or the code expired. To successfully apply a feature code, you must have an Editor role or higher on all account management services. If the expired code needs to be reissued, you would need to contact the person who provided the code for help.

contexts.text:
Why can't I apply a feature code? 

To successfully apply a feature code, make sure the code is valid and that you have the correct account type.

  What’s happening 

When you try to apply a feature code, you see an error that states that the code cannot be applied.

  Why it’s happening 

You might see this error for any of the following reasons:



*  Your account doesn't meet the requirements for the feature code.
*  You don't have the required access in the account.
*  The code expired.



  How to fix it 

Use the following steps to successfully apply a feature code:



*  Verify that you have the correct account type. For example, some feature codes for educational promotions are only for Lite accounts. To view your account type, in the IBM Cloud® console, go to Manage > Account, and select Account settings. For more information, see [Applying feature codes](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/account?topic=account-codes).
*  Verify that you have access to apply the code. To apply any code, you must have an Editor role or higher on all account management services. To view or change roles, see [Assigning access to account management services](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/account?topic=account-account-services).
*  Contact the person who provided the code for help with reissuing an expired code.
*  If you are unable to apply a feature code that you received from an educational provider, contact that educational provider for further assistance.

ml.tokens.model_text: Why can't I apply a feature code

agent.original_text: You might not be able to apply a feature code because your account doesn't meet the requirements for the feature code, you don't have the required access in the account, or the code expired. To successfully apply a feature code, you must have an Editor role or higher on all account management services. If the expired code needs to be reissued, you would need to contact the person who provided the code for help with reissuing a new one. This information is based on the document provided.

llm_based_tags.reasoning: The query starts with 'what about' which is an anaphoric expression referencing prior discussion. It contains the pronoun 'I' but more critically lacks specification of WHICH feature code and in WHAT system/context. The phrase 'what about' indicates this is a follow-up question pivoting from a previous topic to a related issue.
